name.baseName: 煤炭井工开采;开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The production process of the coal mining link belongs to the underground operation, which needs to excavate the roadway from the ground to the underground, including the main links such as drilling and blasting, cutting, mining and loading, transportation and the auxiliary links such as power supply, ventilation, drainage, support and lighting. During the whole mining process, there are direct carbon emission sources such as fuel combustion, spontaneous combustion of stacked coal, coalbed methane emission, raw material and transportation consumption, as well as indirect carbon emission sources such as electricity and underground dust removal water.
该煤炭开采环节的生产过程属于地下作业,需要从地面向地下开掘井巷,包括钻爆、切割、采装、运输等主要环节和动力供应、通风、排水、支护、照明等辅助环节。 在整个开采过程中，有燃料的燃烧、堆放煤的自燃、开采煤层气逸散、原料和运 输消耗等直接碳排放源，也有电力以及井下除尘用水等的间接碳排放源。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Compared with other mining areas in the province, Yongcheng mining area has higher advantages in resource reserves and reserve-mining ratio. It is now divided into 5 exploration coal mining areas and 2 coal prospecting prediction areas. The occurrence of coal seams in Yongcheng mining area is relatively stable, and the mining technical conditions are relatively simple. The dip angle of the mineable coal seam is relatively gentle, which is suitable for mechanized mining.
永城矿区的资源储量和储采比例与省内其他矿区相比具有较高的优势，现共划分 5 个勘探煤矿区、 2 个找煤预测区，永城矿区煤层的赋存较为稳定，开采技术条件也相对简单，可采煤层的倾角 比较平缓，适于机械化开采方式。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The production process of coal mining includes mine field development, roadway excavation, support, mining and so on. The underground mining mainly mines the coal buried in the ground and transports it to the ground through the excavation of the roadway. The inventory analysis of this link mainly includes the consumption of fuel, raw materials, and the emission of waste gas.
煤炭开采环节的生产工艺流程包括井田开拓、井巷掘进、支护、回采等，井工开采主要通过井巷的开挖将埋在地下的煤炭实施开采并输送至地面。对该环节进行清单分析主要包括消耗燃料、原材料，还有废气的逸散。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The coal extracted from the Yongcheng mining area is primarily used for energy production due to its resource reserves and favorable mining conditions. The coal seams' stable occurrence and gentle dip angle facilitate mechanized mining approaches, making the coal suitable for use in power generation plants, industrial boilers, and various manufacturing processes requiring thermal energy.
永城矿区开采出的煤炭主要用于能源生产，因其资源储量充足且开采条件有利。煤层的稳定赋存和较平缓的倾角有利于机械化开采方式，使得这些煤炭适用于电力发电厂、工业锅炉以及需要热能的各种制造过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set for the Yongcheng mining area, it is important to take into account the specific conditions such as the relatively simple mining technical conditions and the mechanization of the mining process. Inventory analysis should consider fuel and raw material consumption, as well as waste gas emissions from the mining process. This data set should be used in accordance with the regional geological characteristics, and it is recommended to update the data regularly to reflect any changes in mining technology or environmental regulations.
在使用永城矿区的生命周期评估数据集时，需要考虑到开采技术条件相对简单和采矿过程的机械化等特定情况。存货分析应当考虑矿山过程中的燃料和原材料消耗以及废气排放。此数据集应根据区域地质特征使用，并建议定期更新数据，以反映采矿技术或环境法规的任何变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Data on “raw coal” consumption activity levels in Xinqiao Coal Mine mining in 2013, energy consumed in the process of coal mining ( raw coal ).
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“原煤”消耗活动水平数据；煤炭开采过程中消耗的能源(原煤)。

This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Data on “gasoline” consumption activity levels in Xinqiao Coal Mine mining in 2013.
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“汽油”消耗活动水平数据。

This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Data on "diesel" consumption activity levels in Xinqiao Coal Mine mining in 2013.
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“柴油”消耗活动水平数据。

This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Data on "water" consumption activity levels in Xinqiao Coal Mine mining in 2013.
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“水”消耗活动水平数据。

This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Data on "electricity" consumption activity levels in Xinqiao Coal Mine mining in 2013.
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“电”消耗活动水平数据。
The literature does not explain the amount of coal input. Assume : the amount of coal input : output = 1 : 1.
文献中没有说明煤炭的投入量，假设：煤炭的投入量:产出量=1:1

This paper obtains various activity level data through field surveys of wells in the Yongcheng mining area. Now, the 2013 data of Xinqiao Coal Mine is used as an example to conduct pre-account analysis. Activity level data of “raw coal production” in Xinqiao Coal Mine in 2013.
论文通过对永城矿区井进行实地调研得到各项活动水平数据,现以新桥煤矿的 2013年的数据为例进行核算前的分析。2013年新桥煤矿矿井开采中“原煤产量”活动水平数据。

Direct carbon emissions from coal mining ( raw coal emission factor 2.0197tCO2 / t * raw coal activity level data 3327t + gas carbon emissions 97516.45t ) ; the original text does not distinguish the flow of bio and fossil, which is judged by experts to be fossil.
开采煤炭的直接碳排放量(原煤排放因子2.0197tCO2/t*原煤活动水平数据3327t+瓦斯的碳排放量97516.45t);原文未区分bio和fossil的流，根据专家判断此处为fossil。
